title: Davis defeats a far-right Republican in a North Carolina House race.
description: Once safely Democratic, the district in the northeastern part of the state was redrawn to become more conservative.
dc:creator: Catie Edmondson

media:content.media:credit: Cornell Watson for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Don Davis emphasized his military service and leaned heavily on the help he had delivered to North Carolinians when he served as the youngest mayor of Snow Hill.
